document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 71''' was released in November/December of 1998. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.Dreadful Vestiges:
: ''By [[Steve Johnson]], illustrated by [[Terry Dykstra]], Cartography by [[Diesel]]..'' '''pp. 48–60'''
{{Quote|(AD&D FORGOTTEN REALMS® Adventure, character levels 4-7; 30 total levels). Some haunted houses are best left unexplored. The third adventure in the [[Mere of Dead Men]] series!}}
